name: Sinker
short_description:
This program will take black and white or full grey scale images and convert them into coordinates in the language that Sinker EDM machines can read and save that as a txt file. This was/is being developed for my father to use so he could 'print' designs on to some projects of his.

Their is a mode to take the full grey scale and use that as a pseudo '3D' to add depth to the process.
summary: Convert B/W Images to Sinker EDM Language
